name: Planeshifter
text: Exploration is in your blood, but the world doesn’t hold your interest. Instead, you enjoy the myriad wonders of the planes. You have extensive knowledge of the planes, and your ability to find portals and traverse dimensions is unrivaled.

features.planeshifter'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain an extra move action for that turn
features.studyOfThePlanes(11thLevel): You acquire and master the Planar Portal ritual, even if you do not have the Ritual Caster feat or are of the appropriate level
features.locationMastery(16thLevel): You and allies within 5 squares of you cannot be teleported against your will

flavorText: You could argue that the sunrise in Arvandor is the most beautiful sight in all the planes—but then, you’ve never seen Erathis pass judgment on a wayward cleric . . .
